system.description:
Effect: All valid targets are afflicted with @Affliction[poison] 5, @Affliction[paralysis] 5, and @Affliction[drowsy] 5.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Butterfree and has a Bug-Type attack on their Active List.
